name: Q2
statement: SELECT VALUE u FROM `GleambookUsers` u WHERE META().id >= "000000000000001" AND META().id <= "000000000000500";

name: Q3
statement: SELECT VALUE u FROM `GleambookUsers` u WHERE u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2000-02-01T00:00:00";

name: Q3
statement: SELECT VALUE u FROM `GleambookUsers` u WHERE u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-01-01T00:00:00";

name: Q4
statement: SELECT VALUE u FROM `GleambookUsers` u where u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2000-02-01T00:00:00" AND (SOME e IN u.employment SATISFIES e.end_date IS UNKNOWN);

name: Q4
statement: SELECT VALUE u FROM `GleambookUsers` u where u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-01-01T00:00:00" AND (SOME e IN u.employment SATISFIES e.end_date IS UNKNOWN);

name: Q6
statement: ARRAY_AVG((SELECT VALUE LENGTH(cm.message_text) FROM `ChirpMessages` cm WHERE cm.send_time >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND cm.send_time < "2001-01-01T00:00:00"));

name: Q7
statement: SELECT cm.user.screen_name AS username, AVG(LENGTH(cm.user.message_text)) AS avg FROM `ChirpMessages` cm WHERE cm.send_time >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND cm.send_time < "2001-01-01T00:00:00" GROUP BY cm.user.screen_name;

name: Q8
statement: SELECT cm.user.screen_name AS username, AVG(LENGTH(cm.user.message_text)) AS avg FROM `ChirpMessages` cm WHERE cm.send_time >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND cm.send_time < "2001-01-01T00:00:00" GROUP BY cm.user.screen_name ORDER BY avg LIMIT 10;

name: Q10
statement: SELECT cm.send_time AS time, cm.message_text AS chirp FROM `ChirpMessages` cm WHERE CONTAINS(cm.message_text, "screen") ORDER BY cm.send_time DESC LIMIT 10;

name: Q12
statement: SELECT u.name AS username, m.message AS message FROM `GleambookUsers` u, `GleambookMessages` m WHERE TO_STRING(META(u).id) = m.author_id AND u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time < "2001-01-01T00:00:00";

name: Q13
statement: SELECT u.name AS username, (SELECT m.message FROM `GleambookMessages` m WHERE TO_STRING(META(u).id) = m.author_id AND m.send_time >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time < "2001-01-01T00:00:00") AS m FROM `GleambookUsers` u WHERE u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-01-01T00:00:00";

name: Q14
description: Select join with grouping aggregation (1 year)
statement: SELECT META(u).id AS id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `GleambookUsers` u, `GleambookMessages` m WHERE TO_STRING(META(u).id) = m.author_id AND u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time < "2001-01-01T00:00:00"  GROUP BY META(u).id;

name: Q15
statement: SELECT META(u).id AS id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `GleambookUsers` u, `GleambookMessages` m WHERE TO_STRING(META(u).id) = m.author_id AND u.user_since >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND u.user_since < "2001-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time >= "2000-01-01T00:00:00" AND m.send_time < "2001-01-01T00:00:00" GROUP BY META(u).id ORDER BY count LIMIT 10;
